participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ksads_dmdd_raw_963_p.Description: How many times per week does your child yell when he or she is upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_972_p.Description: When would you say the problems with your child's temper began?

ksads_dmdd_raw_971_p.Description: Was there a time in the past year when your child did not lose his or her temper at all for 3 months or longer? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_970_p.Description: In the past year, in which situations has your child lost their temper:Others Places | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_969_p.Description: In the past year, in which situations has your child lost their temper:With Family | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_968_p.Description: In the past year, in which situations has your child lost their temper:With Friends | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_967_p.Description: In the past year, in which situations has your child lost their temper:At School | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_dmdd_raw_965_p.Description: How many times per week does your child kick or punch people or things when he or she is upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_964_p.Description: How many times per week does your child throw things when he or she is upset? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_962_p.Description: How many temper outbursts does your child typically have per week? | 0=Zero; 1=One; 2=Two; 3=Three; 4=Four or more

ksads_dmdd_raw_961_p.Description: Has your child had trouble with his or her temper since he or she was young, since before your child was 10? | 0=No; 1=Yes
